text:
National Energy Retail Law (Tasmania)

The National Energy Retail Law, as in force from time to time, set out in the Schedule to the National Energy Retail Law (South Australia) Act 2011 of South Australia is applied (with modifications) as a law of Tasmania by the National Energy Retail Law (Tasmania) Act 2012 and, as so applying, may be referred to as the National Energy Retail Law (Tasmania)

1. Commencement
    The provisions of the National Energy Retail Law were applied as a law of Tasmania on 1 July 2012.

2. Further information
    The full text of the National Energy Retail Law is set out in the Schedule to the National Energy Retail Law (South Australia) Act 2011 of South Australia (click on INFORMATION for a link to South Australian legislation). See the National Energy Retail Law (Tasmania) Act 2012 for modifications to the National Energy Retail Law as it applies in Tasmania.
